Package com.group8rhea.monopolyserver.service

Class RegisterLoginServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group8rhea.monopolyserver.service.RegisterLoginServices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @Service
public class RegisterLoginServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Service that is used by RegistrationController to reach the database on a service level. Provides register login forgetPassword and update password services to the corresponding controllers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        public HttpResponseDto registerUser​(SignUpDto signUpDto)
        Parameters:
        signUpDto - SignUpDto contains : { String username; String password; String email; } example: {"username12", "pass12", "user@gmail.com"}
        Returns:
        HttpResponseDto - Has 3 fields: HTTP Status code, username, response message if the given username exists in the database it returns HTTP.Conflict and user "Already exists response else it saves the user in the database and returns HTTP 201 Created and Succesfull add response

      • loginUser

        public HttpResponseDto loginUser​(SignInDto signInDto)
        Parameters:
        signInDto - SignInDto contains : { String username; String password; } example: {"username12", "pass12"}
        Returns:
        HttpResponseDto - Has 3 fields: HTTP Status code, username, response message Spring Security daoAuthentification Provider checks the credentials of user but additional check is made by this service. if the given username exists in the database it returns HTTP 200 Login Success response else returns HTTP 401 response Username and/or Password is incorrect

      • forgotPassword

        public HttpResponseDto forgotPassword​(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - - users email to send forgot password link
        Returns:
        HttpResponseDto - Has 3 fields: HTTP Status code, username, response message if the given email exists in the database it generates a 6 digit random token and sends an e mail to containing this resettoken returns HTTP 200 Reset link is sent response else returns HTTP 404 Email does not exists response

      • resetPassword

        public HttpResponseDto resetPassword​(ResetPasswordDto resetPasswordDto)
        Parameters:
        resetPasswordDto - { Integer resettoken; String newPassword; } example: {"128349", "passneww"}
        Returns:
        HttpResponseDto - Has 3 fields: HTTP Status code, username, response message resetPasswordDto contains : If the the token is same as the database updates the new password with same encypter and returns Http 200 Password reset response Else returns Http 404 Failed reset password, token is incorrect response
